modName: Helgen Keep prisoner new game save
summary:
In this save, I have skipped everything. Even the character creation. This save starts in Helgen Keep, just after the dragon attacked.
<br />Open console and type: showracemenu
<br />to edit the character!
descriptionHtml:
In this save, I have skipped everything. Even the character creation. This save starts in Helgen Keep, just after the dragon attacked. 
<br />[b][i][size=3][color=#ff0000]To edit the character, press the button under the Esc key. The button with ~ on it, left from the number 1 key. This opens the console. Now type this: [/color][color=#ffff00]showracemenu[/color]
<br />[color=#ff0000]Close the console by pressing the ~ key again.[/color][/size][/i][/b]
<br />You have opened the character creation screen. 
<br />Create the character and [u]you can change the name[/u] when you press done.
author: hyperaidan
